works.description:
Significant portion of this article is copied, example as follow;

Why is the IMEI number important?

It is used to identify valid mobile devices and also to lock the phones remotely by the service provider in case of a theft reported by the subscriber which will render the phone useless irrespective of the service provider used. Thus it is very important and must be kept in a good location one can remember.

Then how can I prevent my cell phone from losing it to the thieves?

With the advent of better technology, mobile phone or cell phone trackers have come up. A tracker is a special software designed to stay hidden in your phone and send specific information quietly from your phone like an SMS to your friend's number.

Nokia Cell Phone (Mobile Phone) Tracker - WaveSecure
While there are some cell phone trackers for Nokia phone, it is only usable on the advance Symbian S60 OS present in Nokia N series phones and similar devices. It isn't usable on the low end devices.

And so on copied...
